TestReportSteps.testObjective: To verify that user is able to add new Crash.
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Invoke the add Crash API /api/crashdetails. Verify that new crash can be added.
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able  to add new Crash record.
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to add new Crash record.
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to add new Crash record.
